titleStmt.title: Mans last journey to his long home a sermon preached at the funerals of the Right Honourable Robert Earl of Warwick, who died in London, May the 30th and was interr'd at Felstead in Essex, June the 9th 1659 / by Nath. Hardy ...
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
